data.message: The whole point of this is he is bleaching his hair back blonde back to the old shady who wrote Stan and he is the best rapper of the past two generations you people just hating because he is picking on trump news flash not everyone has the same political views just because you think you are right doesn’t mean he is wrong

replies.message: Troy Bartley true but point being we all have different opinions no need for the people wishing him dead to bash him just because he is famous when they wouldn’t say the same to a friend if they had the same opinion
